import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { FiClock } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { BsClockHistory } from 'react-icons/bs' import { MdLocationOn } from 'react-icons/md' import { FiEdit2 } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { BsCircleHalf } from 'react-icons/bs' import { BsCircleFill } from 'react-icons/bs' import { FaHeart } from 'react-icons/fa' import { FaWalking } from 'react-icons/fa' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import textData from './AttractionSinglePageData'; export default function AttractionTemplatePage() { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState([]) const { slug } = useParams() useEffect(() => { const getPage = textData.filter(f => f.id === slug); setCurrentPage(getPage) }, [setCurrentPage]) const loopImageForward = () => { // start with state set as 0 and load the array[0 - this is the state] //when click forward = first check state. if the number is < 3 then => state + 1. If the number is 3 then state =>0 } const loopImageBackward = () => { // start with state set as 0 and load the array[0 - this is the state] //when click backward = first check state. if the number is 0 then => set state as 3. If the number is anything except 0 then state -1 } return (

{currentPage.map(m => m.title)}

{currentPage.map(m => m.rating)} ratings

Overview

{currentPage.map(m => m.text)}

{currentPage.map(m => m.open ? 'OPEN NOW' : 'CLOSED NOW') }

m.images[0])} className='template-image' alt='slika' />
) }
